NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_0_DESC: Create your first element using alchemy !
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_3_DESC: That's here. That's home. That's us.
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_5_DESC: The answer to the life, the universe, and everything
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_11_NAME: This cave is not a natural formation
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_13_NAME: I am the fastest man alive
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_18_DESC: When life gives you lemons, don’t make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don’t want your damn lemons, what the hell am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life’s manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I’m the man who’s gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I’m gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_1_19_NAME: The power of the sun, in the palm of my hand
